name: CAP Barbell Olympic 2-Inch Combo Zinc Hex Bar
categoryPath: Sports & Outdoors/Exercise & Fitness/Strength & Weight Training/Weights/Weight Bars & Collars

reviews.name: CAP Barbell Olympic 2-Inch Combo Zinc Hex Bar
reviews.reviewText: I have been working out for a year using various routines for my legs. So I got the hex bar to add more variety. And I can tell you that it hits the quads like no other exercise! I thought I had been working my quads well. But my first rep with the hex bar told me otherwise! I am looking forward to training with this equipment more often. I recommend to anyone who is serious about training their legs.
reviews.title: Targets the quads

reviews.name: CAP Barbell Olympic 2-Inch Combo Zinc Hex Bar
reviews.reviewText:
Very accurate most of the reviews that I read to purchase this Hex Bar. I have problems with my back so it helps a lot to be able to do Squats and Deadlifts and protecting my lower back. Still to early to say but up to the moment am very satisfied. I am not the person that is planning to do very heavy lifting so I don't worry if you can add several hundreds pounds. I train for health and average strengh and not to become a bull!!!!!! The paint is not very good but I don't care as it performs very well.
I am very happy indeed!!!!!!
reviews.title: As expected!!!

reviews.name: CAP Barbell Olympic 2-Inch Combo Zinc Hex Bar
reviews.reviewText: Very satisfied with the bar. It is good quality and very affordable compared to the competition. Suits my needs just fine.
reviews.title: Good quality bar at an affordable price

reviews.name: CAP Barbell Olympic 2-Inch Combo Zinc Hex Bar
reviews.reviewText: Excellent price. Bar is great for shrugs and deadlifts. Provides an alternative to a straight Olympic bar. Reduces stress on lower back with proper exercise form.
reviews.title: CAP Hex Bar

reviews.name: CAP Barbell Olympic 2-Inch Combo Zinc Hex Bar
reviews.reviewText: not the best finish, but good for the price.
reviews.title: great price
